hero.title: A Turnkey Battery Program for Your City
hero.description: Designed for farmers markets, parks, and community events in walkable California cities. Supports cross-department coordination from Sustainability, Public Works, Parks, and Community Development.

items.title: Sustainability & Climate Staff
items.description: Grant writing support, emissions tracking, climate action plan alignment. We provide the data and reporting formats your team needs for CPA grants and Council presentations.

items.title: Public Works & Maintenance
items.description: Field crew equipment specifications, charging infrastructure planning, city-owned unit procurement support. We understand fleet operations and yard logistics.

items.title: Parks & Recreation + Event Permits
items.description: Bounce house vendor coordination, park rental policy development, event permit clean power requirements. We help design programs that work with your existing permit processes.

items.title: Phase 1: Planning & Stakeholder Alignment
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Cross-department discovery, program scope definition, budget sizing aligned with grant constraints. Support for RFP development if needed. Target scenarios identified: which markets, which parks, which events.]

items.title: Phase 2: Infrastructure & Field Crew Rollout
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Charging circuit installation in city yard. Field crew portable units deployed with staff training. Baseline data collection on current generator usage and costs across all four scenarios.]

items.title: Phase 3: Market, Park & Event Conversion
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: First generator-free farmers market. Pilot bounce house battery deployments at weekend park rentals. Support for first city-sponsored festival powered by batteries. Vendor outreach and behavior-change support.]

items.title: Phase 4: Measurement & Policy Recommendations
items.description: [PLACEHOLDER: Data analysis: emissions avoided, generator-hours replaced, vendor participation, community feedback. Staff support for permanent policy development: event permit requirements, park rental clean power rules, vendor transition timelines.]
